dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Geoffrey Zweig
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank (PTB) corpus is used for evaluating language modeling tasks, containing standard train/validation/test splits with a total of 930k training, 74k validation, and 82k test words, and a vocabulary limited to 10,000 words.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB) corpus

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Geoffrey Zweig
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank language modeling task is a specific evaluation task based on the Penn Treebank corpus, focusing on language modeling performance.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank language modeling task
